module.display: Framework|Networking|Wi-Fi|${module.framework.sf_wifi_v2.name} GT202 Wi-Fi Device Driver on sf_wifi_gt202

constraint.display: Module instances must have unique names

property.display: Name (Must be a valid C symbol)

constraint.display: Name must be a valid C symbol
Value must be in range 1 to 17

property.display: Delivery Traffic Indication Message (DTIM) Interval (Valid range: 1-255)

constraint.display: Value must be in range 1 to 255

property.display: Beacon Interval in Microseconds (AP mode only and must be greater than 1023)

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or equal to 1024

property.display: Station Inactivity Time out in Seconds (AP mode only and must be greater than 0)

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or equal to 1

property.display: Reset Pin (Must be a valid C symbol)

constraint.display: Name must be a valid C symbol

property.display: Slave Select Pin (SSL)(Must be a valid C symbol)

constraint.display: Name must be a valid C symbol

property.display: GT202 Driver Task Thread Priority (Modifying Task Thread Priority may cause Driver to malfunction).

constraint.display: Numerical priority of thread. Legal values range from 0 through (TX_MAX_PRIORITY-1), where a value of 0 represents the highest priority
Name must be a valid C symbol
